headline: Is Goldman’s Coinbase Upgrade And eToro Downgrade Reshaping The Investment Case For eToro Group (ETOR)?
summary: Recently, Goldman Sachs upgraded Coinbase while downgrading eToro Group to Neutral, citing rising competition and possible pricing pressure as eToro prepares for further U.S. expansion. The contrast between Coinbase’s broadening product set and eToro’s reassessment highlights how fast-changing trading and crypto ecosystems can reshape competitive positioning. We’ll now examine how this analyst downgrade, especially the concerns around U.S. expansion risks, may influence eToro Group’s...
